inbox.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the place in a computer email program where new messages arrive
inbox.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I had 130 emails in my inbox this morning.
inbox.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a container on an office desk that is used to hold letters, documents etc that you must deal with
inbox.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: the place on a computer where new email messages arrive
inbox.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: An email filter will stop your inbox from filling up with spam.
inbox.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a flat container used to hold letters, papers etc that need to be dealt with
